Houston.Susanne M. Glasscock School of Continuin:
The Susanne M. Glasscock School of Continuing Studies at Rice University offers the Houston community the opportunity to study personal and professional areas of interest. It is named in honor of an endowment gift from Houstonians Susanne and Melbern Glasscock.


== History ==
Established as the Office of Continuing Studies in December 1967, the school provides a bridge between Rice University and its Houston neighbors.
